pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Trait Dissimilarity with more Uniform Contributions // R function gawdis() produces multi-trait dissimilarity with more uniform contributions of different traits. de Bello et al. (2021) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.13537 presented the approach based on minimizing the differences in the correlation between the dissimilarity of each trait, or groups of traits, and the multi-trait dissimilarity. This is done using either an analytic or a numerical solution, both available in the function.
